channel.title: SaveThatWave: specifying the file name – Politepix

item.title: SaveThatWave: specifying the file name
item.dc:creator: gman
item.description:
Hi Halle,

Is there a way to specify the file name for a SaveThatWave recording? I can’t find it in the docs. For now I’m using a move in the call back, but that’s obviously not a great solution.

Thanks.

item.title: Reply To: SaveThatWave: specifying the file name
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Hi gman,

Sorry, the naming system isn’t possible to change currently. I can put it in as a feature request. The timestamp would always need to be part of it in order to avoid collisions.

item.title: Reply To: SaveThatWave: specifying the file name
item.dc:creator: gman
item.description:
Makes sense. No need to open a feature request since I have a workaround.
Thanks again.
